Text: Thanks GIANNIS511! For what it's worth, the Spider-Man/Beast team-up does not appear in this issue. It's replaced by Rogue/Black Widow.
F.y.i. phthallin, you could find it by searching 001 since searching A+X doesn't help. Here you go!  http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7777632/A_X_001_
I'm a huge fan of Chris Bachalo and we need him back on Wolverine & the X-Men! A couple decent stories here but nothing earth shattering.
